query: <s> summarize marketing 's story and description of the butterfly she drew during the discussion of favourite animals .
answer: marketing : okay . um , well i guess i had the most time to think about it . i 'm going to draw a butterfly , because i saw a butterfly yesterday , that seemed to be like the symbol of spring arriving . and it was actually the prettiest butterfly i 've ever seen out in the wild , and i though that was pretty cool in scotland . it was like , well it was a little pointier than that . at first i thought it was a dead leaf . user interface : marketing : and then it landed on the wall next to me . but this part was all brown and then it has these big blue dots like this . and then it kinda there was a green , i think it was a green ring , and there was like red going out like this . project manager : it 's kinda like a peacock . user interface : marketing : yeah , it kinda was actually , 'cause it was this part of the body was really dull , and then it was the most colourful exotic butterfly ever , and i 'm like , wow this is the middle of scotland in like march . project manager : industrial designer : marketing : so i thought that was pretty cool . and it landed by a wall and let me look at it for about two minutes . i wish i 'd had my camera . so that 's gon na be my favourite animal because after all the snow it seemed to say that like spring is finally here . yeah . industrial designer : very nice . marketing : there you go .
